task: Write ghost_trade_fusion.py to use ghost AI personality traits to adjust trade risk and sizing.
Write dark_arb_hunter.py to scan ETH, BSC, MATIC for cross-exchange arbitrage and place trades.
Write ai_propaganda_orchestrator.py to broadcast hype stories and signals to Discord/Telegram.
Write modules that take vault data from ghost_bank_manager and adjust risk automatically.
Write modules that fuse ghost personalities from ghost_biofabricator with trade sizing.
Write modules that generate propaganda based on ghost_bank_manager vault state and ghost_trade_executor win rates.
Write modules that scan new blockchains for liquidity sniping opportunities.
Write ghost_solana_sniper.py that probes thin liquidity and links to ghost_cyber_state.json
Write ghost_voice_strategist.py that reads ghost_cyber_state.json, ghost_memory.json and narrates live trade plans, sniper executions, liquidity hunts using an AI voice API
Write ghost_narrator.py that listens to ghost_memory.json and tells dark ghost stories of victories, losses, propaganda pushes, and future targets with randomized emotional tones
Integrate ghost_voice_strategist.py to report current aggression, greed, stealth, next trade plan, and cross-chain sniper positioning every 5 min
Integrate ghost_narrator.py to speak war stories, vault surveys, propaganda victories or humiliations, adapting mood from ghost_cyber_state.json
